tactic.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a method that you use to achieve something
tactic.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a tactic employed to speed up the peace process
Republicans accuse Democrats of using delaying tactics (=something you do in order to give yourself more time) to prevent a final vote on the bill.
